revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = P2 Laboratory |image = [[File:P2 Laboratory.png|300px]] |caption = A map of P2 Laboratory. |tokens = 396,500 |location = Unova Route 18 }} '''P2 Laboratory''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Unova]]. It initially has 81 tiles arranged in an 9x9 square, including 9 chest tiles, 21 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 5,403,000 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Scyther.png|40px]] Scyther || rowspan=7 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Electrode.png|40px]] Electrode |- | [[File:Pineco.png|40px]] Pineco |- | [[File:Forretress.png|40px]] Forretress |- | [[File:Metang.png|40px]] Metang |- | [[File:Ferroseed.png|40px]] Ferroseed |- | [[File:Ferrothorn.png|40px]] Ferrothorn |}
===Boss Encounters=== <!--T:5-->
<!--T:6--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Ursaring.png|40px]] '''Ursaring*''' || rowspan=2|<center> 58,000,000 || rowspan=7|[[File:Team_Plasma_(colress).png|30px]] Team Plasma Colress || [[File:Magneton.png|40px]] Magneton || rowspan=5|<center>10,000,000 |- | [[File:Durant.png|40px]] '''Durant*''' || [[File:Rotom_(wash).png|40px]] Rotom (wash) |- | [[File:Mawile.png|40px]] '''Mawile*''' || rowspan=5|<center>62,000,000 || [[File:Metagross.png|40px]] Metagross |- | [[File:Sableye.png|40px]] '''Sableye*''' || [[File:Beheeyem.png|40px]] Beheeyem |- | [[File:Zangoose.png|40px]] '''Zangoose*''' || [[File:Magnezone.png|40px]] Magnezone |- | [[File:Audino.png|40px]] '''Audino*''' || rowspan=2|[[File:Klinklang.png|40px]] Klinklang || rowspan=2|<center>11,000,000 |- | [[File:Genesect.png|40px]] '''Genesect*''' |- |}
<!--T:7--> '''*Must have cleared P2 Laboratory at least once to unlock all Dungeon Boss Pokémon'''
==Items== <!--T:8--> <tabs> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:9--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || N/A || 12.50% || 12.03% || 10.11% |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 2 || 24.99% || 24.05% || 20.21% |- | {{Bag2|Token Collector}} || 2 || 24.99% || 24.05% || 20.21% |- | {{Pokemon|Forretress|mimic}} || N/A || 12.50% || 12.03% || 10.11% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || N/A || 5.00% || 5.26% || 6.30% |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 5.00% || 5.26% || 6.30% |- | {{Bag2|Green Shard}} || N/A || 5.00% || 5.26% || 6.30% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 5.00% || 5.26% || 6.30% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Iron Plate}} || 2 || 1.60% || 2.08% || 4.04% |- | {{Bag2|Insect Plate}} || 2 || 1.60% || 2.08% || 4.04% |- | {{Bag2|Zap Plate}} || N/A || 0.80% || 1.04% || 2.02% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 1.00% || 1.59% || 4.03% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Galar, the drop chance for items in Unova will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic). {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
